name: Clean all garbage
description:
Small game for curdle jam #8

Theme is "on the fence"

You are playing as an young man, who need to clean 2 lawns from garbage before sun get down. It is unusual, but the sun is setting down at lawn where more garbage is. So get your hands dirty and clean all garbage from lawns!

CONTROLS:

Movement - WASD /arrows           or           joystick

Run - SHIFT            or            X on xbox controller

Grab/Throw - E /Z           or           B on xbox controller

Jump - SPACE           or           A on xbox controller
